title: Captive
description: As Felicity falls deeper in love with Alex, she finds herself immersed in Alexâ€™s dark, erotic, succubus world. She and Alex are both in danger as a killer trails their every move. Not even the threat of torture and death can stop their passion when Alex reveals her motives for finding Felicity. Will their love conquer all or will they meet their end at the hands of a madman?
author: Felicia Fox
